Question
========

70% of the Chinese live in rural areas. You take a random sample of 200 Chinese and count the number who live in rural areas. live. The probability that 130 or more Chinese in the sample live in the rural area can be written as:

Answerlist
----------

* P(z ≥ 1.54)
* P(z ≤ - 1,54)
* 1 - P(z ≥ 1.54)
* 1 - P(z ≤ - 1,54)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* P(z ≥ 1.54): Incorrect
* P(z ≤ - 1.54): Incorrect
* 1 - P(z ≥ 1.54): Incorrect
* 1 - P(z ≤ - 1.54): Correct
